Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Staleness \Stale"ness\, n. The quality or state of being stale. [1913 Webster]
staleness n 1: unoriginality as a result of being dull and hackneyed [syn: {triteness}] 2: having lost purity and freshness as a consequence of aging [ant: {freshness}]
